titleStmt.title: Joseph Howard, Jr. to Samuel L. Clemens : an electronic text

p.bibl: The Mark Twain Papers, The Bancroft Library, University of California, Berkeley (CU-MARK).

body.head: Joseph Howard, Jr. to Samuel L. Clemens 31 March 1884 • New York, N.Y. (MS: CU-MARK, UCLC 41953)

div1.p: I first met you, twenty four years ago, in front of the City Hall.There is no record (and little possibility) of their meeting anytime around 1860, when Clemens was piloting on the Mississippi River. Since then I have followed you step by step, generally with approval, always with interest & professional pride. The old guard are nearly all gone, & the men we used to meet in the Times office, are either dead or out of harness. I have a Mark Twain collection, complete in every way save that it needs your autograph. Send it to me, old man, & add to the obligation of
